Şerban Bondor

computer science student & frontend developer

Read More

I am a student who is currently studying computer science in the german language in Cluj-Napoca at the Babeș-Bolyai University and it's my last year at the university. I know the basics of a lot of programming languages but my expertise is in web development.

I made some projects using html, css, javascript, also some libraries and frameworks for frontend development, but I also used python, php and sql for the backend. Plus some other projects for university and when I was an intern at MHP I worked in SAP using ABAP.

I also have a Cambridge English: Advanced (CAE) certificate and a Deutsche Sprach Diplom(DSD) certificate both with C1 level so I can write and speak fluently in both languages.
